code: import React from"react";import"./styles/Barcode.css";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import Im1 from"./assets/바코드1.png";import Im2 from"./assets/바코드2.png";import Im3 from"./assets/바코드3.png";import Im4 from"./assets/바코드4.png";import Im5 from"./assets/바코드5.png";import Im6 from"./assets/바코드6.png";import ShareButton from"./assets/공유하기버튼.png";import BottomBar from"./BottomBar";import{ReactComponent as Share}from"./assets/share.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const barcodeImages={1:Im1,2:Im2,3:Im3,4:Im4,5:Im5,6:Im6};function Barcode(){const{id}=useParams();const handleShare=()=>{alert("성공적으로 공유되었습니다!");};const productImage=barcodeImages[id];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"barcode-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"purchase-info",style:{paddingTop:"49px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"purchase-text",children:["\uAD6C\uB9E4\uD55C \uC0C1\uD488\uC740 \uB0B4 \uC815\uBCF4->\uAD6C\uB9E4\uB0B4\uC5ED",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"\uC5D0\uC11C\uB3C4 \uD655\uC778 \uAC00\uB2A5\uD569\uB2C8\uB2E4"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-img-container",style:{paddingTop:"23px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:productImage,alt:"\uC0C1\uD488 \uBC14\uCF54\uB4DC",className:"product-img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"share-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"share-button-text",children:"\uACF5\uC720\uD558\uAE30"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"share-button-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Share,{className:"share-button-image"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BottomBar,{})]});}export default Barcode;
